Header: Kiriwanagama Central Students Learn Army Leadership Skills
Content: An Army-organized training workshop on 'Leadership' for students at Kiriwanagama Central College in Haldummulla Divisional Secretariat got underway during 11- 13 January following instructions given by the Commander of the Army Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake. Major General Ruwan de Silva, Commander Security Forces - Central supported the conduct of the training sessions. 61 Students under 14 Army trainers were trained for leadership skills, teamwork and creativity, presenting theoretical and practical modules.
